Name: Pichuncho Cocktail
Ingredients: 60 ml BarSol Mosto Verde Italia Pisco
2.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Grape combines with fortified wine in a sublime after-dinner sipper.
History: Based on the traditional Chilean drink: pisco and vermouth.
Nutrition: One serving of Pichuncho Cocktail contains 163 calories
